ARABIC: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّى بَعْضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعْضًۢا بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In that way We make the wrongdoers friends of one another because of what they have done.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Thus do We place some sinners over others as requital for their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In this manner We shall make the wrong-doers friends of each other (in the Hereafter) because they earned (evil together in the world).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus do We make the unjust friends of one another because of their evil deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And similarly We empower some of the oppressors over others – the recompense of their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And thus We do make the wrongdoers supporters of one another, because of that which they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And thus do We make some of the iniquitous to befriend others on account of what they earned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We make the evildoers friends of each other for what they have earned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus We let some of the wrong-doers have power over others because of what they are wont to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And in like manner We shall keep the wrongdoers close to others as a punishment for their misdeeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thus We shall keep some of the wrong-doers close to others for that which they were wont to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is how We make the wrongdoers one another’s friends because of what they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus do we make the wrong-doers turn to each other, because of what they earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And thus We do make the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers, etc.) Auliya' (supporters and helpers) one to another (in committing crimes etc.), because of that which they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So We make the harmdoers guides of each other for what they have earned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus We make some of the wrongdoers befriend one another, because of what they used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And thus will We make some of the wrongdoers allies of others for what they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:129] So, just as We let the rebels from among mankind and jinn enjoy one another, We let some of the evildoers have power over others because of what they are wont to earn, of acts of disobedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus We let some of the wrong-doers) the idolaters (have power over others) in the life of this world and in the Hereafter; it is also said that this means: We let some of the idolaters have authority over others (because of what they are wont to earn) and say of evil.
